quoteText: Send you product updates, marketing communication, and service information
title: No assurance of an opt-out method for non-transactional email

tosdr.case: You cannot opt out of promotional communications
tosdr.tldr: If you are a registered user of a LastPass website and have supplied your email address, LastPass may occasionally send you an email to tell you about new features, solicit your feedback, or just keep you up to date with what's going on with LastPass and their products. They expect to keep this type of email to a minimum.
